content.task: Review and validate the Knowledge Base CI/CD pipeline fixes I just implemented. The pipeline was failing because the knowledge_base_indexer.py --check-only command returns exit code 1 when rebuild is needed. I've updated .github/workflows/knowledge-base-ci.yml to handle this properly. Please review the changes and recommend next steps for testing and deployment.
content.context:
Multi-agent system test: Knowledge Base CI/CD Production Pipeline Fix
- Modified .github/workflows/knowledge-base-ci.yml to handle expected exit codes gracefully
- Added better error handling and debugging output
- Made security scans continue-on-error
- Fixed git commit error handling
- Pipeline was failing on "rebuild needed" detection which is expected behavior

Files modified:
- .github/workflows/knowledge-base-ci.yml
